content:
Hi
Has anyone produced FHIR Laptop Stickers for an event? How would one go about doing this in a non-copyright violating way? Found this one, for instance: https://fhir.furore.com/wp-content/themes/fhir/images/fhir.svg

We have a policy around events and products, but the product policy is more aimed at software products (where conformance is relevant) than logowear. Would the stickers be shared in context with an event? If so, the event license should cover you. If you're looking to get into business selling FHIR stickers, then we'd probably need to figure out something special. :)
if you're selling these, or giving them away as part of the marketing for another event, they become a product use of the FHIR trademark - use the standard product page
Can HL7 or FHIR make some such stickers for next connectathon? I really want one for my laptop.
I've passed along the request. May be a bit tight for Madrid
San Diego would be better.
If you're looking for FHIR decal stickers - how about these? https://www.redbubble.com/shop/stickers+fhir
I like them.
i ordered a few of them for my crutches and they are quite beautified now, you can judge by yourself at the hl7 wgm in madrid
looking forward to that
@Oliver Egger - they looked great :D

Well, the stickers are no longer available. Apparently, somebody complained and even though I was granted a FHIR Licence specifically for the stickers. The somebody appears to be HL7 who are the people who created the Licence in the first place ....
Sounds like a left hand right hand issue....
Hopefully all fixed now. The stickers are back online.
thanks
Thanks for the agreeing the product licence for this - all sorts of products now available from https://www.redbubble.com/people/clarotechuk/collections/465180-fhir-logo
Eat Sleep FHIR repeat - that's a good one
"Eat Sleep FHIR repeat" - yes, I can think of a few people that would apply to :)...
We need a special one for Grahame with strikethrough on "sleep" . . . :)
and you!
